text: The DGM Barbados Open is a senior (over 50s) men's professional golf tournament. It is played on the Caribbean island state of Barbados. It is the opening event on the European Seniors Tour. It is the only event on the tour that takes place in the Americas. The PGA European Tour organisation is based in the United Kingdom. Barbados is a former British colony. The tournament was first played in 2000. It is hosted by the Royal Westmoreland Golf Club. ==Winners== DGM Barbados Open *2009 Sam Torrance - *2008 Bill Longmuir - *2007 Gordon J. title: DGM Barbados Open
